div.p: Flag_of_Serbia.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 900 × 600 pixels, file size: 189 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

div.div: Српски / Srpski: Застава Србије / Zastava Srbije
Словѣ́ньскъ / ⰔⰎⰑⰂⰡⰐⰠⰔⰍⰟ: Срь́бїѧ зна́мѧ / ꙗⰔⱃⱐⰱⰻⱔ ⰸⱀⰰⰿⱔ
Srpskohrvatski / Српскохрватски: Застава Србије / Zastava Srbije

table.style: border:2px solid #d3d3d3; background-color:white; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; width:100%; text-align:center; cellpadding:0px; direction:ltr;

tr.td: It is easy to put a border around this image:

img.alt: Flag of Serbia.svg

p.span: العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Galego | Hrvatski | Magyar | Հայերեն | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | Bahasa Melayu | Malti | Nederlands | ‪Norsk (bokmål)‬ | Polski | Português | Runa Simi | Română | Русский | Slovenčina | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | Türkçe | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

td.i: This work is in the public domain because it is a law, decree, regulation or official material of a Republic of Serbia state body or a body performing public functions, under the terms of Article 6, Paragraph 2 of Serbian copyright law. See Copyright.
td.p:
A source should be included so that the status can be verified.
Deutsch | English | Македонски | +/−

img.alt: Coat of arms of Serbia.svg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:40, 8 September 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 06:24, 8 September 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 03:44, 27 July 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 09:59, 15 February 2008 (asked on my talk page))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:09, 15 June 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 18:39, 15 May 2008 (rv banned user))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:27, 15 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 09:59, 15 February 2008 Serbian Recommendation does depict the images and no matter of how small those images are they are in use in Serbia. Also the colour you are edit-waring for are not in real-time usage - anywhere - they jus)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:39, 15 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 04:50, 15 May 2008 Serbian "law" does not depict your colours, these are the colours shown on detailed templates on the Serbian parliament's website)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:20, 15 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 09:59, 15 February 2008 Then change the file to the colours of the Recommendation (http://www.parlament.sr.gov.yu/content/lat/help/grb-himna_lat.htm) which are the "law" in Serbia. The pdf file is contradictional because shows im)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:50, 15 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 19:47, 10 May 2008 This version is the one which all the templates on Wikipedia use such as the outline map of Serbia with the flag in the centre)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:45, 14 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 09:59, 15 February 2008 The version has support on Image talk:Flag of Serbia.svg and is based on a Parliament of Serbia source rather than some webmasters (unnamed) pdf file which is in contradiction with itself (the CMYK and)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:47, 10 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 16:27, 12 December 2006 same colours, but no black outline)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 19:46, 10 May 2008

td.span: (Reverted to version as of 04:16, 31 January 2006 These colours are the ones shown on the Serbian government's PDF file for the coat of arms and flag)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:59, 15 February 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 09:57, 15 February 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 12:50, 9 February 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 20:01, 3 February 2008

td.span: (On page 7 of the Flag and Arms Standard sheet from the Serbian Government, they list the CMYK colors. I went ahead and used those.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:34, 28 January 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 23:40, 6 May 2007

td.span: (This is the official flag of Serbia found at the government of Serbia's website)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 14:10, 24 February 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 16:27, 12 December 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 08:29, 11 December 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 23:26, 3 December 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 19:27, 20 August 2006

td.span: (code to avoid white stripes after scaling)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:11, 31 May 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:23, 22 April 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 21:21, 22 April 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 08:26, 9 February 2006

td.span: (Flag of Serbia with Correct colors. Based on official version issued by Parliament of Serbia http://www.parlament.sr.gov.yu/content/cir/o_skupstini/simboli/simboli.asp)
